title: Get Help from Healer Nettie
content:
f she can help you. Follow Nettie to a spot in the wall that she has opened up ( X:-439 Y:6), head into the Enclave Library to see a Drow on the table. This makes you (if you re a Drow) uncomfortable and Nettie explains herself. This will give you the following dialogue options.

[DROW] He and I have the same kind of parasite? I'm hoping for a less grave cure. So you killed him and laid him out on the table? Is everyone being captured by mind flayers these days? Didn't think it was a common expe
